flounder.helpers

Class CompressionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.helpers.CompressionUtils

  • public class CompressionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class capable of compressing and decompressing strings with gzip.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompressionUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] compress(java.lang.String string)
      Compresses a string into an array of bytes.
      static java.lang.String decompress(byte[] bytes)
      Decompresses a array of bytes back into a string.

    • Method Detail

      • compress

        public static byte[] compress(java.lang.String string)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Compresses a string into an array of bytes.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to compress.
        Returns:
        The compressed list of bytes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If failed to compress.

      • decompress

        public static java.lang.String decompress(byte[] bytes)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Decompresses a array of bytes back into a string.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The compressed list of bytes.
        Returns:
        The string uncompress.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If failed to uncompress.
